article.headline: Cal Poly SLO 70, UC Riverside 54
article.story: RIVERSIDE, Calif. (AP) -- Titus Shelton scored 13 points and Matt Hansen added 12 as Cal Poly defeated UC Riverside 70-54 Thursday night. Dreshawn Vance and Tyler McGinn added 10 points apiece for the Mustangs (15-10, 6-5 Big West), which won its fourth straight game. Cal Poly's Derek Stockalper grabbed a game-high nine rebounds and scored nine points. Justin Bell scored 15 points, Henrick Thomsen had 12 and Larry Cunningham added 10 for UC Riverside (6-21, 1-11). Overall, the Highlanders shot just 38.9 percent from the field and were out rebounded 40-26. Cal Poly shot 48.1 percent from the field to win for the ninth time in the past 11 games.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
